description:
Wordle is a word-guessing game where players attempt to deduce a hidden 11-letter word (all uppercase). Each guess provides feedback (1) Correct letter in the correct position, represented by `A`; (2) Correct letter but misplaced, represented by `M`; (3) Letter not in the word, represented by `X`. 
 Players iteratively refine guesses using feedbacks until solving the word, typically within limited attempts. After a few times of querying, the player will give an 11-letter uppercase word answer, and he'll win if he answers the correct word. 
 OUTPUT the 11-letter uppercase word directly.
